Browse the source code of netbsd/crypto/external/bsd/openssl/lib/libdes/oread2pwd.c

1/* crypto/des/read2pwd.c */

58
59#include "des_locl.h"
60
61int des_read_password(des_cblock *key, const char *prompt, int verify)
62 {
63 int ok;
64 char buf[BUFSIZ],buff[BUFSIZ];
65
66 if ((ok=des_read_pw(buf,buff,BUFSIZ,prompt,verify)) == 0)
67 des_string_to_key(buf,key);
68 OPENSSL_cleanse(buf,BUFSIZ);
69 OPENSSL_cleanse(buff,BUFSIZ);
70 return(ok);
71 }
72
73int des_read_2passwords(des_cblock *key1, des_cblock *key2, const char *prompt,
74 int verify)
75 {
76 int ok;
77 char buf[BUFSIZ],buff[BUFSIZ];
78
79 if ((ok=des_read_pw(buf,buff,BUFSIZ,prompt,verify)) == 0)
80 des_string_to_2keys(buf,key1,key2);
81 OPENSSL_cleanse(buf,BUFSIZ);
82 OPENSSL_cleanse(buff,BUFSIZ);
83 return(ok);
84 }
85
